events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and the material feels different from the description.
The customer's message indicates a desire for a refund due to product dissatisfaction and incorrect sizing.
Assigning the refund request to agent Sarah Thompson for handling and follow-up.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer service. I understand you would like to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed, so we can proceed with the refund process?
Thanks for responding quickly. My order number is 987654321. The jacket has only been tried on once and hasn't been washed or altered.
Thank you for the details. We will approve your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
I appreciate your prompt help and look forward to receiving the return label by email so I can send the item back as soon as possible.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to check if you have received the return label and if you have sent the jacket back for refund processing.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Please let me know when the refund is completed.
The returned jacket has been received and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount credited on your card shortly.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email to hear your feedback on our refund service.
The customer completed the survey expressing satisfaction with the prompt and professional refund handling.
The refund case has been formally closed following successful completion and positive customer feedback.
